 Set the frame to "movable" state. This means that the frame can be moved by clicking anywhere in the skin.

Detailed Description

Base class for all skinned frames.

This class manages skinned frames. Normally you won't have to use it directly. Use one of the frame classes (wxSkinSimpleFrame and wxSkinFrame) instead.
